### üìù How to use Highlight

üßæ Click the Shapes Annotation icon to access the drawing tools.

üñçÔ∏è Right-click to enable the highlight to apply the highlight color to the selected content.

‚ö° Select the text you highlithed again to switch to a different color or remove the highlight entirely.

üí¨ After highlighting, Start a Thread to create a conversation tied directly to the highlighted section.

### üí° Tips 

* Use highlights to guide attention, organize long messages, or visually separate key concepts.

* Highlighting before starting a thread helps others understand exactly what part you‚Äôre referring to.

* Keep highlighting minimal so the Dot doesn‚Äôt become visually overwhelming.
